00025 using System.Drawing.Imaging;

00027 using System.Windows.Forms;
00028 #endregion

00030 namespace Utilities.Web.WebPageThumbnail

00035     public class WebPageThumbnail
00036     {

00039

00041         public WebPageThumbnail()
00042         {
00043         }
00044         #endregion

00046         #region Private Variables
00047         private Bitmap Image;
00048         private string FileName;
00049         private string Url;
00050         private int Width;
00051         private int Height;
00052         #endregion

00062         public void GenerateBitmap(string FileName, string Url, int Width, int Height)
00063         {
00064             this.Url = Url;
00065             this.FileName = FileName;
00066             this.Width = Width;
00067             this.Height = Height;
00068             Thread TempThread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(CreateBrowser));
00069             TempThread.SetApartmentState(ApartmentState.STA);
00070             TempThread.Start();
00071             TempThread.Join();
00072         }
00073         #endregion
00074 
00075         #region Private Functions
00076 
00077 
00078 
00079         private void CreateBrowser()
00080         {
00081             WebBrowser Browser = new WebBrowser();
00082             try
00083             {
00084                 Browser.ScrollBarsEnabled = false;
00085                 DateTime TimeoutStart = DateTime.Now;
00086                 TimeSpan Timeout = new TimeSpan(0, 0, 10);
00087                 Browser.Navigate(Url);
00088                 Browser.DocumentCompleted += new WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventHandler(Browser_DocumentCompleted);
00089                 while (Browser.ReadyState != WebBrowserReadyState.Complete)
00090                 {
00091                     if (DateTime.Now - TimeoutStart > Timeout)
00092                         break;
00093                     Application.DoEvents();
00094                 }
00095             }
00096             catch { }
00097             finally
00098             {
00099                 Browser.Dispose();
00100             }
00101         }
00107         void Browser_DocumentCompleted(object sender, WebBrowserDocumentCompletedEventArgs e)
00108         {
00109             WebBrowser Browser = (WebBrowser)sender;
00110             Browser.ScriptErrorsSuppressed = true;
00111             Browser.ScrollBarsEnabled = false;
00112             if (Width == -1)
00113             {
00114                 Browser.Width = Browser.Document.Body.ScrollRectangle.Width;
00115             }
00116             else
00117             {
00118                 Browser.Width = Width;
00119             }
00120             if (Height == -1)
00121             {
00122                 Browser.Height = Browser.Document.Body.ScrollRectangle.Height;
00123             }
00124             else
00125             {
00126                 Browser.Height = Height;
00127             }
00128             Image = new Bitmap(Browser.Width, Browser.Height);
00129             Browser.BringToFront();
00130             Browser.DrawToBitmap(Image, new Rectangle(0, 0, Browser.Width, Browser.Height));
00131             Image.Save(FileName,ImageFormat.Bmp);
00132         }
00133         #endregion
00134     }
00135 }
